title: WHIG Develops Targeted Deception Campaigns for Congressional Skeptics
description: WHIG identifies congressional members likely to oppose Iraq authorization and develops individualized deception campaigns targeting their specific concerns and constituencies. The campaigns include fabricated intelligence reports, manipulated threat assessments, and coordinated pressure tactics from lobbying groups.
significance: Shows systematic effort to manipulate specific legislators through targeted disinformation, corrupting the democratic process through individualized deception campaigns.

sources.title: The Lie Factory: How the Bush Administration Used Network of Front Groups
